id.description: The unique ID of the comic resource (optional)

digitalId.description: The ID of the digital comic representation of this comic. Will be 0 if the comic is not available digitally (optional)

title.description: The canonical title of the comic (optional)

issueNumber.description: The number of the issue in the series (will generally be 0 for collection formats) (optional)

variantDescription.description: If the issue is a variant (e.g. an alternate cover, second printing, or director’s cut), a text description of the variant (optional)

description.description: The preferred description of the comic (optional)

modified.description: The date the resource was most recently modified (optional)

isbn.description: The ISBN for the comic (generally only populated for collection formats) (optional)

upc.description: The UPC barcode number for the comic (generally only populated for periodical formats) (optional)

diamondCode.description: The Diamond code for the comic (optional)

ean.description: The EAN barcode for the comic (optional)

issn.description: The ISSN barcode for the comic (optional)

format.description: The publication format of the comic e.g. comic, hardcover, trade paperback (optional)

pageCount.description: The number of story pages in the comic (optional)

textObjects.description: A set of descriptive text blurbs for the comic (optional)

resourceURI.description: The canonical URL identifier for this resource (optional)

urls.description: A set of public web site URLs for the resource (optional)

id.description: The unique ID of the creator resource (optional)

firstName.description: The first name of the creator (optional)

middleName.description: The middle name of the creator (optional)

lastName.description: The last name of the creator (optional)

suffix.description: The suffix or honorific for the creator (optional)

fullName.description: The full name of the creator (a space-separated concatenation of the above four fields) (optional)

modified.description: The date the resource was most recently modified (optional)

resourceUri.description: The canonical URL identifier for this resource (optional)

id.description: The unique identifier of the event resource (optional)

resourceURI.description: The canonical URL identifier for this resource

urls.description: A set of public web site URLs for the event

modified.description: The date the resource was most recently modified

start.description: The date of publication of the first issue in this event

end.description: The date of publication of the last issue in this event

id.description: The unique ID of the series resource (optional)

title.description: The canonical title of the series (optional)

resourceURI.description: The canonical URL identifier for this resource (optional)

urls.description: A set of public web site URLs for the resource (optional)

startYear.description: The first year of publication for the series (optional)

endYear.description: The last year of publication for the series (conventionally, 2099 for ongoing series) (optional)

rating.description: The age-appropriateness rating for the series (optional)

id.description: The unique ID of the story resource (optional)

description.description: A short description of the story (optional)

resourceURI.description: The canonical URL identifier for this resource (optional)

type.description: The story type e.g. interior story, cover, text story (optional)

modified.description: The date the resource was most recently modified (optional)
